item.title: Azure Virtual Network Basics – Public vs Private Networks
item.description:
Azure Virtual Network Basics – Public vs Private

If you’re getting started with Azure Networking, the first concept you must master is the Virtual Network (aka VNet). This is the foundation of all networking in Azure.

What is a VNet?

A Virtual Network (VNet) in Azure is like your private data center network in the cloud. It allows Azure resources (like VMs, App Services, etc.) to communicate with each other securely. Think of it like a virtual version of a LAN (Local Area Network).
